resources.string: Press to capture an image manually
Press to toggle camera flash off or on
Press to get helpful hints using MiSnap
Make sure to: 1 - Center on a plain dark surface; 2 - Provide enough light; 3 - touch the capture button
"Make sure to: 1 - Center on a plain dark surface; 2 - Provide enough light; 3 - hold steady, and we'll take the picture for you."
